synopsis.text: Koku u, a gifted mutant, and Keith Flick, a relentless detective, both grappled with their haunting pasts, ultimately revealing the sinister truths concealed within the Kingdom of Cremona. Months have elapsed, and the world appears to have moved on from the chaos that once ensued. Keith resumes his duties with the Royal Police, while Kokuu and Yuna seek solace in the tranquility of everyday life. However, the ramifications of the Jaula Blanca experiments are far from over. Kokuu's seemingly deceased lab partner, Kirisame, resurfaces, harboring a peculiar request that threatens to disrupt their newfound peace.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
